RequestOption.description:
Type of Shipping desired.
Valid value: 1 - Ground Freight Shipping

SubVersion.description:
When UPS introduces new elements in the response that are not associated with new request elements, Subversion is used. This ensures backward compatibility.

To get such elements you need to have the right Subversion. The value of the subversion is explained in the Response element Description.

Example: Itemized Charges are returned only when the Subversion element is present and greater than or equal to '1601'. 

Format: YYMM = Year and month of the release.
Example: 1601 = 2016 January
 
Supported values: 1601, 1607

CustomerContext.description: The CustomerContext Information which will be echoed during response.

TransactionReference.description: TransactionReference identifies transactions between client and server.

Name.description: The shippers name or company name.

TaxIdentificationNumber.description:
Companys Tax Identification Number at the pickup location.
Required if SED form (International forms) is requested

StateProvinceCode.description: The consignees state or province code.

CountryCode.description: The consignees country or territory code.

AttentionName.description: Contact name at the ship from location.

FaxNumber.description: The ship from locations Fax Number.

ShipperNumber.description:
Shippers six digit account number.
Size must be six alphanumeric characters. Must be associated with the User Id specified in the Access Request XML.

Name.description: The Consignees name or company name.

TaxIdentificationNumber.description: Company's Tax Identification Number of the Consignee

StateProvinceCode.description: The consignees state or province code.

CountryCode.description: The consignees country or territory code.

AttentionName.description: Contact name at the ship to location.

StateProvinceCode.description: The consignees state or province code.

CountryCode.description: The consignees country or territory code.

ShipperNumber.description:
Payers account number.
Users 6 digit UPS account number or 9 digit SCS account number.

AttentionName.description: Contact name at the payers location.

Code.description:
Billing Option Code.
Valid values:
10 - Prepaid
30 - Bill to Third Party
40 - Freight Collect
The code for the UPS Service associated with the shipment.

Description.description: A text description of the UPS Service associated with the shipment.
Description of the form type code.

HandlingUnitOne.description:
HandlingUnit Container.
Required for Ground Shipments.

Description.description: Description of the form type code.

ShipmentNumber.description: The PRO Number assigned to the shipment.

BOLID.description:
The retrieval key for the stored BOL.
Deprecated. retained for backward compatibility
ConfirmationNumber should be used.

Description.description: Description of the form type code.

Type.description:
Container for the type of unique pickup confirmation number.
Required only for Shipment Updates.

Value.description:
The unique pickup confirmation number or BOLID value.
Required only for Shipment Updates.

ConfirmationNumber.description:
Container for the existing shipment pickup confirmation number.
Required only for Shipment Updates.

HandlingInstructions.description:
General purpose instructions to the driver.  
Example: Call 30 minutes before

Description.description: Description of articles, special marks, freight codes.

Length.description: The length of the line item used to determine density rate rating.

Width.description: The width of the line item used to determine the density based rating.

Height.description: The height of the line item used to determine density based rating.

Code.description:
Code associated with the Packaging Type.
Refer to Packaging Types in the Appendix for valid values.

Description.description: Description for the code associated with the Packaging Type.

PrimeCode.description:
National Motor Freight Classification Commodity prime code.
Must be 6 digits representing the NMFC prime code. 
This field is required if NMFCCommodity/SubCode is supplied.

SubCode.description:
National Motor Freight Classification Commodity sub code.
Must be 2 digits representing the NMFC sub code.
If this field is supplied, NMFCCommodity/PrimeCode also has to be supplied.

NMFCCommodity.description:
Container for National Motor Freight Classification Commodity.  This Container is for customers who choose to send the NMFC Prime and sub code as two different fields.
This container is mutually exclusive with NMFCCommodityCode element above.

Code.description:
Reference number type code for the entire shipment.
For valid values, see Reference Codes in the Appendix.

BarCodeIndicator.description: The presence of the tag BarCodeIndicator indicates that the reference at index 1 is bar-coded.

NumberOfCartons.description:
Number of cartons attached to this reference.
Strongly recommended for ground services.

Code.description: The code associated with the unit of measure for the billable weight of a shipment.

Description.description: The description for the billable weight associated with the shipment.

Value.description:
The value for the total weight associated with this reference.

Valid characters: 0-9 and "." (Decimal). 
Maximum of 2 digits after the decimal. 
Maximum field length: 16 characters. The decimal ".", does not count as a character.
Examples:
##############.##
###############.#
################

Weight.description:
Reference Weight Container.
Strongly recommended for ground services.Ignored for air services.

Reference.description:
Reference Container.
Max number of references allowed: 200

Code.description:
The code associated with the email type for the shipment service options.
Valid values:
001- Ship Notification
002- Delivery Notification
003  Exception Notification
004  BOL/Labels(Ground Only)

Description.description: A text description of the code for the email type associated with the shipment service options.

EMailAddress.description: Email address where the notification is sent.

EMailText.description:
Contents of the email to be sent.
Only used for BOL Email Types. Otherwise ignored.

UndeliverableEMailAddress.description: The address where an undeliverable email message is sent if the email with the notification is undeliverable.

Subject.description:
Email subject line.
Only used for BOL Email Types. Otherwise ignored.

EMailInformation.description:
EmailInformation Container.
Multiple Email Information Containers with the same EMail Type Code is not allowed.

HolidayPickupIndicator.description: The presence of the tag HolidayPickupIndicator indicates that the shipment requires a holiday pickup.

InsidePickupIndicator.description: The presence of the tag InsidePickupIndicator indicates that the shipment requires an inside pickup.

ResidentialPickupIndicator.description: The presence of the tag ResidentialPickupIndicator indicates that the shipment requires a residential pickup.

WeekendPickupIndicator.description: The presence of the tag WeekendPickupIndicator indicates that the shipment requires a weekend pickup.

LiftGateRequiredIndicator.description: The presence of the tag LiftGateRequiredIndicator indicates that the shipment requires a lift gate.

LimitedAccessPickupIndicator.description: The presence of the tag LimitedAccessPickupIndicator indicates that there is limited access for pickups.

CallBeforeDeliveryIndicator.description: The presence of the tag CallBeforeDeliveryIndicator indicates that the shipment is going to be delivered after calling the consignee.

HolidayDeliveryIndicator.description: The presence of the tag HolidayDeliveryIndicator indicates that the shipment is going to be delivered on a holiday.

InsideDeliveryIndicator.description: The presence of the tag InsideDeliveryIndicator indicates that the shipment requires an inside delivery.

ResidentialDeliveryIndicator.description: The presence of the tag ResidentialDeliveryIndicator indicates that the shipment requires a residential delivery.

WeekendDeliveryIndicator.description: The presence of the tag WeekendDeliveryIndicator indicates that the shipment is going to be delivered on a weekend.

LiftGateRequiredIndicator.description: The presence of the tag LiftGateRequiredIndicator indicates that the shipment requires a lift gate.

LimitedAccessDeliveryIndicator.description: The presence of the tag LimitedAccessDeliveryIndicator indicates that there is limited access for delivery.

Volume.description:
Represents the size as volume.

Volume being required if height, length, width is not specified. 
If volume is present then height, length, width is ignored.

Valid characters: 0-9 and "." (Decimal). 
Maximum of 2 digits after the decimal. 
Maximum field length: 16 characters. The decimal ".", does not count as a character.
Examples:
##############.##
###############.#
################

Height.description: The height of the line item used to determine density based rating.

Length.description: The length of the line item used to determine density rate rating.

Width.description: The width of the line item used to determine the density based rating.

Code.description: The code associated with the unit of measure for the billable weight of a shipment.

Description.description: The description for the billable weight associated with the shipment.

CurrencyCode.description:
Currency code type for Price per cubic feet.
Valid value: USD - United States Dollar

MonetaryValue.description:
Price per cubic feet.
Valid characters: 0-9 and "." (Decimal). 
Maximum of 2 digits after the decimal. 
Maximum field length: 16 characters. The decimal ".", does not count as a character.
Examples:
##############.##
###############.#
################

Cube.description:
Dimensions Value Cube Container.
Request should contain PricerPerCubicFoot, PricerPerCWT, or both.

CurrencyCode.description:
Currency code type for Price per CWT.
Valid value: USD - United States Dollar

MonetaryValue.description:
Price per CWT.
Valid characters: 0-9 and "." (Decimal). 
Maximum of 2 digits after the decimal. 
Maximum field length: 16 characters. The decimal ".", does not count as a character.
Examples:
##############.##
###############.#
################

CWT.description:
Dimensions Value CWT Container.
Request should contain PricerPerCubicFoot, PricerPerCWT, or both.

OverSeasLeg.description:
OverSeasLeg Container.
Accessorial required when origin or destination is Hawaii, Alaska, and Puerto Rico.

CurrencyCode.description:
COD amount currency code type.
Valid value: USD  United States Dollar

MonetaryValue.description:
COD Amount.
Valid characters: 0-9 and "." (Decimal). 
Maximum of 2 digits after the decimal. 
Maximum field length: 16 characters. The decimal ".", does not count as a character.
Examples:
##############.##
###############.#
################

Code.description:
The code associated with the COD payment method for the shipment service options.
Valid values:
M - Company Check
R - Certified Check

Description.description: A text description of the code for the COD payment method associated with the shipment service options.

Code.description:
The code associated with the COD billing option for the shipment service options.
Valid values:
01 - Prepaid
02 - Freight Collect

Description.description: A text description of the code for the COD billing option associated with the shipment service options.

Name.description: The payee company name for the COD charges.

StateProvinceCode.description: The consignees state or province code.

CountryCode.description: The consignees country or territory code.

AttentionName.description: Payee contact name for the COD charges.

FaxNumber.description: Payee fax number for the COD charges.

EMailAddress.description: Payee email address for the COD charges.

Name.description: The contact name for question re: Dangerous Goods.

Quantity.description: Quantity of units to be sorted/segregated.

CurrencyCode.description:
Declared value amount currency type.
Valid value: USD - United States Dollar

MonetaryValue.description:
Declared value amount.
Valid characters: 0-9 and "." (Decimal). 
Maximum of 2 digits after the decimal. 
Maximum field length: 16 characters. The decimal ".", does not count as a character.
Examples:
##############.##
###############.#
################

CurrencyCode.description:
Excess Declared value amount currency type.
Valid value: USD - United States Dollar

Percentage.description:
Percentage amount consistent with the handling charge.
Either Percentage or Amount needs to be present, not both.
Negative value allowed.
Valid characters: 0-9 and "." (Decimal). 
Maximum of 2 digits after the decimal. 
Maximum field length: 7 characters. The decimal ".", does not count as a character.

MonetaryValue.description:
Handling Charge amount.
Negative value allowed.
Valid characters: 0-9 and "." (Decimal). 
Maximum of 2 digits after the decimal. 
Maximum field length: 16 characters. The decimal ".", does not count as a character.
Examples:
##############.##
###############.#
################

Amount.description:
HandlingCharge Amount Container.
Either Percentage or Amount needs to be present, not both.

FreezableProtectionIndicator.description: The presence of the tag FreezableProtectionIndicator indicates that the customs clearance is required.

ExtremeLengthIndicator.description:
The presence of the tag ExtremeLengthIndicator indicates that the customs clearance is required.
It is recommended to provide 'LinearFeet' if this indicator is sent.

LinearFeet.description:
Dimensional length of the article(s), in 'feet'.
Numeric value greater than 0 (Zero) should be given in LinearFeet.
If Proper LinearFeet is not provided, accurate charge for extreme length articles might not be returned.
If linear feet 0 (Zero) or any non-numeric/invalid character is sent, accurate charge for extreme length articles might not be returned.
Ignored if ExtremeLengthIndicator is not present.

ThirdPartyIndicator.description: Indicates whether the requester is Consignee, Third Party, Shipper, other.

Requester.description:
Requester Container. Also referred to as caller.
Required for ground shipments if PickupRequest container is present.

PickupDate.description:
Date of the Pickup. 
Format: YYYYMMDD.
Ground pickup may be scheduled up to 42 days in the future.
Note: This element will act as PickupDate or DropOffDate based on the presence of PickupTimeReady or DropOffTimeReady element.

EarliestTimeReady.description:
The earliest time a shipment is ready to be picked up.
The time is on a 24 hour clock. 
Format: HHMM
HH = Hour values 00 to 23
MM = Minute values 00 to 59

LatestTimeReady.description:
The latest time a shipment can be picked up. Can be also referred as the Closing Time for a pickup time window.
The time is on a 24 hour clock. 
Format: HHMM
HH = Hour values 00 to 23
MM = Minute values 00 to 59
Optional if the account type is House.

POMNumber.description: An identifier associated to the pickup request (may or may not be created by the user)

POMNumberType.description:
Identifies the kind of number used to identify the POM shipment.
For valid values, see POMNumberType Values in the Appendix.

EMailAddress.description: Email address which should receive pre-pickup notification

EventType.description:
Type of event for POM Notification. Add up to four events.
01 = PICKUP_REQUEST_CONFIRM
02 = DRIVER_EN_ROUTE
03 = PICKUP_SECURED
04 = PICKUP_EXCEPTION

FailedEMail.description: Alternate email address to receive failure notifications

Description.description: Description of the form type code.

Code.description: Code representing the format of the form. Currently only pdf is supported.

Description.description: Description of the format code of the form.

AttentionName.description: Contact name at the ship from location.

StateProvinceCode.description: The consignees state or province code.

AttentionName.description: Contact name at the ship to location.

StateProvinceCode.description: The consignees state or province code.

CountryCode.description: The consignees country or territory code.

Reference.description: Reference Container. Only two references are allowed. If more than 2 references are provided, then only the first two will be used and the subsequent reference containers will be ignored.

Code.description:
Code associated with the Packaging Type.
Refer to Packaging Types in the Appendix for valid values.

TotalWeight.description: Total weight of all the commodities.

CurrencyCode.description: Currency code. This value applies to the unit price of all the commodities.

TimeInTransitIndicator.description: Presence of the tag indicates Time in Transit information is requested and will be returned if available.

Quantity.description: Handling Unit Quantity for Density based Rating

Description.description: Description of the form type code.

Type.description: Handling Unit Type for Density based Rating.

Code.description: The code associated with the unit of measure for the billable weight of a shipment.

Description.description: The description for the billable weight associated with the shipment.

Length.description: The length of the line item used to determine density rate rating.

Dimensions.description: Dimension of the handling unit for density based pricing.

HandlingUnits.description: Handling Unit for Density based Rating.

DensityEligibleIndicator.description: The presence of the tag DensityEligibleIndicator indicates that the density based rate is requested.
